00077 #define MAXUNDONAME 64 /* XXX, make common define */

00079 /* ***************** generic undo system ********************* */
00080 
00081 void ED_undo_push(bContext *C, const char *str)
00082 {
00083     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00084     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00085     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00086 
00087     if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00088         printf("undo push %s\n", str);
00089     
00090     if (obedit) {
00091         if (U.undosteps == 0) return;
00092         
00093         if (obedit->type == OB_MESH)
00094             undo_push_mesh(C, str);
00095         else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF))
00096             undo_push_curve(C, str);
00097         else if (obedit->type == OB_FONT)
00098             undo_push_font(C, str);
00099         else if (obedit->type == OB_MBALL)
00100             undo_push_mball(C, str);
00101         else if (obedit->type == OB_LATTICE)
00102             undo_push_lattice(C, str);
00103         else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE)
00104             undo_push_armature(C, str);
00105     }
00106     else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) {
00107         if (U.undosteps == 0) return;
00108         
00109         PE_undo_push(CTX_data_scene(C), str);
00110     }
00111     else {
00112         if (U.uiflag & USER_GLOBALUNDO) 
00113             BKE_write_undo(C, str);
00114     }
00115     
00116     if (wm->file_saved) {
00117         wm->file_saved = 0;
00118         /* notifier that data changed, for save-over warning or header */
00119         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WM | ND_DATACHANGED, NULL);
00120     }
00121 }
00122 
00123 /* note: also check undo_history_exec() in bottom if you change notifiers */
00124 static int ed_undo_step(bContext *C, int step, const char *undoname)
00125 {   
00126     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00127     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00128     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00129 
00130     /* undo during jobs are running can easily lead to freeing data using by jobs,
00131      * or they can just lead to freezing job in some other cases */
00132     if (WM_jobs_test(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_data_scene(C))) {
00133         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00134     }
00135 
00136     /* grease pencil can be can be used in plenty of spaces, so check it first */
00137     if (ED_gpencil_session_active()) {
00138         return ED_undo_gpencil_step(C, step, undoname);
00139     }
00140 
00141     if (sa && sa->spacetype == SPACE_IMAGE) {
00142         SpaceImage *sima = (SpaceImage *)sa->spacedata.first;
00143         
00144         if ((obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT) || sima->flag & SI_DRAWTOOL) {
00145             if (!ED_undo_paint_step(C, UNDO_PAINT_IMAGE, step, undoname) && undoname)
00146                 if (U.uiflag & USER_GLOBALUNDO)
00147                     BKE_undo_name(C, undoname);
00148 
00149             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
00150             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154     if (sa && sa->spacetype == SPACE_TEXT) {
00155         ED_text_undo_step(C, step);
00156     }
00157     else if (obedit) {
00158         if (ELEM7(obedit->type, OB_MESH, OB_FONT, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_MBALL, OB_LATTICE, OB_ARMATURE)) {
00159             if (undoname)
00160                 undo_editmode_name(C, undoname);
00161             else
00162                 undo_editmode_step(C, step);
00163 
00164             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, NULL);
00165         }
00166     }
00167     else {
00168         int do_glob_undo = 0;
00169         
00170         if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT) {
00171             if (!ED_undo_paint_step(C, UNDO_PAINT_IMAGE, step, undoname))
00172                 do_glob_undo = 1;
00173         }
00174         else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
00175             if (!ED_undo_paint_step(C, UNDO_PAINT_MESH, step, undoname))
00176                 do_glob_undo = 1;
00177         }
00178         else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) {
00179             if (step == 1)
00180                 PE_undo(CTX_data_scene(C));
00181             else
00182                 PE_redo(CTX_data_scene(C));
00183         }
00184         else {
00185             do_glob_undo = 1;
00186         }
00187         
00188         if (do_glob_undo) {
00189             if (U.uiflag & USER_GLOBALUNDO) {
00190                 // note python defines not valid here anymore.
00191                 //#ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00192                 // XXX      BPY_scripts_clear_pyobjects();
00193                 //#endif
00194                 if (undoname)
00195                     BKE_undo_name(C, undoname);
00196                 else
00197                     BKE_undo_step(C, step);
00198 
00199                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_LAYER_CONTENT, CTX_data_scene(C));
00200             }
00201             
00202         }
00203     }
00204     
00205     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
00206     
00207     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00208 }
00209 
00210 void ED_undo_pop(bContext *C)
00211 {
00212     ed_undo_step(C, 1, NULL);
00213 }
00214 void ED_undo_redo(bContext *C)
00215 {
00216     ed_undo_step(C, -1, NULL);
00217 }
00218 
00219 void ED_undo_push_op(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00220 {
00221     /* in future, get undo string info? */
00222     ED_undo_push(C, op->type->name);
00223 }
00224 
00225 void ED_undo_pop_op(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00226 {
00227     /* search back a couple of undo's, in case something else added pushes */
00228     ed_undo_step(C, 0, op->type->name);
00229 }
00230 
00231 /* name optionally, function used to check for operator redo panel */
00232 int ED_undo_valid(const bContext *C, const char *undoname)
00233 {
00234     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00235     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00236     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00237     
00238     if (sa && sa->spacetype == SPACE_IMAGE) {
00239         SpaceImage *sima = (SpaceImage *)sa->spacedata.first;
00240         
00241         if ((obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT) || sima->flag & SI_DRAWTOOL) {
00242             return 1;
00243         }
00244     }
00245     
00246     if (sa && sa->spacetype == SPACE_TEXT) {
00247         return 1;
00248     }
00249     else if (obedit) {
00250         if (ELEM7(obedit->type, OB_MESH, OB_FONT, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_MBALL, OB_LATTICE, OB_ARMATURE)) {
00251             return undo_editmode_valid(undoname);
00252         }
00253     }
00254     else {
00255         
00256         /* if below tests fail, global undo gets executed */
00257         
00258         if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT) {
00259             if (ED_undo_paint_valid(UNDO_PAINT_IMAGE, undoname) )
00260                 return 1;
00261         }
00262         else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
00263             if (ED_undo_paint_valid(UNDO_PAINT_MESH, undoname) )
00264                 return 1;
00265         }
00266         else if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) {
00267             return PE_undo_valid(CTX_data_scene(C));
00268         }
00269         
00270         if (U.uiflag & USER_GLOBALUNDO) {
00271             return BKE_undo_valid(undoname);
00272         }
00273     }
00274     return 0;
00275 }
00276 
00277 static int ed_undo_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00278 {
00279     /* "last operator" should disappear, later we can tie ths with undo stack nicer */
00280     WM_operator_stack_clear(CTX_wm_manager(C));
00281     return ed_undo_step(C, 1, NULL);
00282 }
00283 
00284 static int ed_undo_push_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00285 {
00286     char str[MAXUNDONAME];
00287     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "message", str);
00288     ED_undo_push(C, str);
00289     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00290 }
00291 
00292 static int ed_redo_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00293 {
00294     return ed_undo_step(C, -1, NULL);
00295 }

00300 void ED_OT_undo(wmOperatorType *ot)
00301 {
00302     /* identifiers */
00303     ot->name = "Undo";
00304     ot->description = "Undo previous action";
00305     ot->idname = "ED_OT_undo";
00306     
00307     /* api callbacks */
00308     ot->exec = ed_undo_exec;
00309     ot->poll = ED_operator_screenactive;
00310 }

00312 void ED_OT_undo_push(wmOperatorType *ot)
00313 {
00314     /* identifiers */
00315     ot->name = "Undo Push";
00316     ot->description = "Add an undo state (internal use only)";
00317     ot->idname = "ED_OT_undo_push";
00318     
00319     /* api callbacks */
00320     ot->exec = ed_undo_push_exec;
00321 
00322     ot->flag = OPTYPE_INTERNAL;
00323 
00324     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "message", "Add an undo step *function may be moved*", MAXUNDONAME, "Undo Message", "");
00325 }

00340 /* ui callbacks should call this rather than calling WM_operator_repeat() themselves */
00341 int ED_undo_operator_repeat(bContext *C, struct wmOperator *op)
00342 {
00343     int ret = 0;
00344 
00345     if (op) {
00346         wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00347         struct Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00348 
00349         ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00350         ARegion *ar1 = BKE_area_find_region_type(CTX_wm_area(C), RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00351 
00352         if (ar1)
00353             CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar1);
00354 
00355         if ( (WM_operator_repeat_check(C, op)) &&
00356              (WM_operator_poll(C, op->type)) &&
00357              /* note, undo/redo cant run if there are jobs active,
00358               * check for screen jobs only so jobs like material/texture/world preview
00359               * (which copy their data), wont stop redo, see [#29579]],
00360               *
00361               * note, - WM_operator_check_ui_enabled() jobs test _must_ stay in sync with this */
00362              (WM_jobs_test(wm, scene) == 0))
00363         {
00364             int retval;
00365 
00366             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00367                 printf("redo_cb: operator redo %s\n", op->type->name);
00368             ED_undo_pop_op(C, op);
00369 
00370             if (op->type->check) {
00371                 op->type->check(C, op); /* ignore return value since its running again anyway */
00372             }
00373 
00374             retval = WM_operator_repeat(C, op);
00375             if ((retval & OPERATOR_FINISHED) == 0) {
00376                 if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
00377                     printf("redo_cb: operator redo failed: %s, return %d\n", op->type->name, retval);
00378                 ED_undo_redo(C);
00379             }
00380             else {
00381                 ret = 1;
00382             }
00383         }
00384         else {
00385             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) {
00386                 printf("redo_cb: WM_operator_repeat_check returned false %s\n", op->type->name);
00387             }
00388         }
00389 
00390         /* set region back */
00391         CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00392     }
00393     else {
00394         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) {
00395             printf("redo_cb: ED_undo_operator_repeat called with NULL 'op'\n");
00396         }
00397     }
00398 
00399     return ret;
00400 }
00401

00403 void ED_undo_operator_repeat_cb(bContext *C, void *arg_op, void *UNUSED(arg_unused))
00404 {
00405     ED_undo_operator_repeat(C, (wmOperator *)arg_op);
00406 }

00408 void ED_undo_operator_repeat_cb_evt(bContext *C, void *arg_op, int UNUSED(arg_event))

00410     ED_undo_operator_repeat(C, (wmOperator *)arg_op);
00411 }

00415 
00416 #define UNDOSYSTEM_GLOBAL   1
00417 #define UNDOSYSTEM_EDITMODE 2
00418 #define UNDOSYSTEM_PARTICLE 3
00419 
00420 static int get_undo_system(bContext *C)
00421 {
00422     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00423     
00424     /* find out which undo system */
00425     if (obedit) {
00426         if (ELEM7(obedit->type, OB_MESH, OB_FONT, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_MBALL, OB_LATTICE, OB_ARMATURE))
00427             return UNDOSYSTEM_EDITMODE;
00428     }
00429     else {
00430         Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00431         
00432         if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)
00433             return UNDOSYSTEM_PARTICLE;
00434         else if (U.uiflag & USER_GLOBALUNDO)
00435             return UNDOSYSTEM_GLOBAL;
00436     }
00437     
00438     return 0;
00439 }
00440 
00441 /* create enum based on undo items */
00442 static EnumPropertyItem *rna_undo_itemf(bContext *C, int undosys, int *totitem)
00443 {
00444     EnumPropertyItem item_tmp = {0}, *item = NULL;
00445     int active, i = 0;
00446     
00447     while (TRUE) {
00448         const char *name = NULL;
00449         
00450         if (undosys == UNDOSYSTEM_PARTICLE) {
00451             name = PE_undo_get_name(CTX_data_scene(C), i, &active);
00452         }
00453         else if (undosys == UNDOSYSTEM_EDITMODE) {
00454             name = undo_editmode_get_name(C, i, &active);
00455         }
00456         else {
00457             name = BKE_undo_get_name(i, &active);
00458         }
00459         
00460         if (name) {
00461             item_tmp.identifier = name;
00462             /* XXX This won't work with non-default contexts (e.g. operators) :/ */
00463             item_tmp.name = IFACE_(name);
00464             if (active)
00465                 item_tmp.icon = ICON_RESTRICT_VIEW_OFF;
00466             else 
00467                 item_tmp.icon = ICON_NONE;
00468             item_tmp.value = i++;
00469             RNA_enum_item_add(&item, totitem, &item_tmp);
00470         }
00471         else
00472             break;
00473     }
00474     
00475     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, totitem);
00476     
00477     return item;
00478 }
00479 
00480 
00481 static int undo_history_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00482 {
00483     int undosys, totitem = 0;
00484     
00485     undosys = get_undo_system(C);
00486     
00487     if (undosys) {
00488         EnumPropertyItem *item = rna_undo_itemf(C, undosys, &totitem);
00489         
00490         if (totitem > 0) {
00491             uiPopupMenu *pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, RNA_struct_ui_name(op->type->srna), ICON_NONE);
00492             uiLayout *layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
00493             uiLayout *split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0), *column = NULL;
00494             int i, c;
00495             
00496             for (c = 0, i = totitem - 1; i >= 0; i--, c++) {
00497                 if ( (c % 20) == 0)
00498                     column = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00499                 if (item[i].identifier)
00500                     uiItemIntO(column, item[i].name, item[i].icon, op->type->idname, "item", item[i].value);
00501                 
00502             }
00503             
00504             MEM_freeN(item);
00505             
00506             uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
00507         }       
00508         
00509     }
00510     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00511 }
00512 
00513 /* note: also check ed_undo_step() in top if you change notifiers */
00514 static int undo_history_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00515 {
00516     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "item")) {
00517         int undosys = get_undo_system(C);
00518         int item = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "item");
00519         
00520         if (undosys == UNDOSYSTEM_PARTICLE) {
00521             PE_undo_number(CTX_data_scene(C), item);
00522         }
00523         else if (undosys == UNDOSYSTEM_EDITMODE) {
00524             undo_editmode_number(C, item + 1);
00525             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, NULL);
00526         }
00527         else {
00528             BKE_undo_number(C, item);
00529             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_LAYER_CONTENT, CTX_data_scene(C));
00530         }
00531         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_WINDOW, NULL);
00532         
00533         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00534     }
00535     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00536 }
00537 
00538 void ED_OT_undo_history(wmOperatorType *ot)
00539 {
00540     /* identifiers */
00541     ot->name = "Undo History";
00542     ot->description = "Redo specific action in history";
00543     ot->idname = "ED_OT_undo_history";
00544     
00545     /* api callbacks */
00546     ot->invoke = undo_history_invoke;
00547     ot->exec = undo_history_exec;
00548     ot->poll = ED_operator_screenactive;
00549     
00550     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "item", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Item", "", 0, INT_MAX);
00551 
00552 }
